comment:
Large mobile production units:These are vehicles that can hold 6 people and require 2 parking spots each for transportation of equipment and staff during movie production.
Small mobile production units:These are vehicles that can hold 2 people and require 1 parking spot each for transportation of equipment and staff during movie production. Movie stars prefer these units to share with close staff.
Space efficiency:Refers to the ability of a vehicle to accommodate more people while occupying fewer parking spots. In this context, large mobile production units are more space efficient per spot compared to small units.
